Trump opened Mar: a-Lago as a private club and allowed Jews and African Americans to join, making it different from most private clubs in Palm Beach.
Trump did not sue the City of Palm Beach: a-Lago to Jews and Blacks. This claim is false.
Mar: a-Lago was originally a private residence owned by Marjorie Merriweather Post before Trump bought it in 1985 and turned it into a private club.
Trump: s lawyer, Paul Rampell, convinced him of the business value of wider membership by arguing that Palm Beach had many Jewish residents but lacked a real club of their own.
